text: Elvira Quintillá (19 September 1928 - 27 December 2013) was a Spanish actress. Her career has lasted for nearly 60 years. Quintillá was born in Barcelona. Her career began in 1941. In 1947, she married José María Rodero. They were married until Rodero's death in May 1991. Quintillá died at the age of 85, in Madrid. She died from a heart attack. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1928 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish television actors Category:Spanish stage actors Category:Actors from Barcelona
title: Elvira Quintillá
